videoDetails.Title: CAS DESTROYING GROUND BATTLES in WAR THUNDER
videoDetails.Description:
Today I'm playing with  AMX 50 FOCH from the French tech tree in War Thunder.  With update "Danger Zone"   FOCH received a buff to reverse speed (-19km/h), so we're coming back to test it out. I also ran in a lot of cas this time, they are everywhere...
  AMX 50 Foch gameplay  In ground realistic battles War Thunder Danger Zone update. 


War Thunder is a free-to-play vehicular combat multiplayer video game developed and published by Gaijin Entertainment. It has a cross-platform format for Microsoft Windows, macOS, Linux, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, and Shield Android TV.

War thunder danger zone update brings a lot of new vehicles like F-14A Tomcat, HMS Hood, G6 Rhino, Pvkv III, SMS Bayern, M1A1 AIM, Kronshtadt, ZTZ99A, and many more. AMX 50 Foch gameplay in War Thunder  similar game to World of Tanks, but with more realistic approach. Similar to games like hell let loose, post scriptum , squad and orhers
